Content:
Cicadas incoming: Billions of insects poised to emerge in double-brood invasion
The winged insects are set to pop out of the ground in the coming weeks in a rare synchronized event that last occurred in 1803.

I saw a hatch of these in Virginia about 17 years ago and they were everywhere. They don't live very long and if you get a bunch of them on the road, they could make it a very slippery ride.

With the billions or even trillions of Cicadas bursting on the scene with the double emergence in the southern USA this summer, things could get very slippery on the roads.

Cicadas incoming: Billions of insects poised to emerge in double-brood invasion
The winged insects are set to pop out of the ground in the coming weeks in a rare synchronized event that last occurred in 1803.
